0010110101101010 1000100111011100 0 -> sum: 1011011101000110, cout: 0

1001100001000000 1101110110011101 1 -> sum: 0111010111011110, cout: 1

0110101111100111 1110001000000110 0 -> sum: 0100110111101101, cout: 1

1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
